title: What is your favorite podcast on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is my favourite podcast on Spotify. Some podcasts are based on fascinating stories, some on comedy, some which give knowledge and some motivational. Here’s the list! Stuff You Should Know: Listen Now (knowledge gaps and clearing misconceptions is the base)Why Won't You Date Me?: Listen Now (tackles topics like getting through dry spells, her green-card marriage, and the hilarious pitfalls of the modern dating scene)In the Dark: Listen Now (this is the podcast for the people ho love listening fascinating stories)WTF With Marc Maron: Listen Now (best comedy podcast and awesome interviews with comedians, movie stars and other celebs)This is Love: Listen Now (It's sweet, poignant, and tells real stories with love and dedication whether you're in a relationship or not)

I’m a little biased course…but have you heard of our podcast, The Psilocybin Chronicles? The Psilocybin Chronicles by MycoMeditations (Links to all podcast directories in the link once you scroll down a bit^) In it we interview guests and people who work as facilitators/therapists at our psilocybin mushroom retreat in Jamaica. People come down for a week and have amazing experiences which unpack so much trauma and suffering that has made them depressed, anxious, addicted to alcohol, given them PTSD, etc. We share their transformations and talk about how psilocybin mushrooms have a huge role in the way we can heal and grow ourselves and our society at large. Check it out!
